mapper.select:
select
from hetongshengcheng where bianhao = #{bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 0,1

select count(*) from hetongshengcheng where 1=1 and bianhao like concat('%',#{bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shebeimingcheng like concat('%',#{shebeimingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and hetongbianhao like concat('%',#{hetongbianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and hetongneirong like concat('%',#{hetongneirong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and caigougongsi like concat('%',#{caigougongsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and caigouriqi >= concat('',#{caigouriqi1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and caigouriqi <= concat('',#{caigouriqi2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and caigouren like concat('%',#{caigouren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select from hetongshengcheng where 1=1
and bianhao =#{bianhao}

select from hetongshengcheng where 1=1 and bianhao like concat('%',#{bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shebeimingcheng like concat('%',#{shebeimingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and hetongbianhao like concat('%',#{hetongbianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and hetongneirong like concat('%',#{hetongneirong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and caigougongsi like concat('%',#{caigougongsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and caigouriqi >= concat('',#{caigouriqi1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and caigouriqi <= concat('',#{caigouriqi2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and caigouren like concat('%',#{caigouren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') order by id desc
limit #{pageno},#{pageSize}

bianhao, shebeimingcheng, hetongbianhao, hetongneirong, caigougongsi, caigouriqi, caigouren,

update hetongshengcheng
bianhao = #{bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shebeimingcheng = #{shebeimingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hetongbianhao = #{hetongbianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hetongneirong = #{hetongneirong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, caigougongsi = #{caigougongsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, caigouriqi = #{caigouriqi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, caigouren = #{caigouren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update hetongshengcheng set bianhao = #{bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},shebeimingcheng = #{shebeimingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},hetongbianhao = #{hetongbianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},hetongneirong = #{hetongneirong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},caigougongsi = #{caigougongsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},caigouriqi = #{caigouriqi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},caigouren = #{caigouren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
